meta.title: JC-WH_startOut
meta.description: start file for Jubilee Campus to Wollaton Hall walk, outward section

scenes.name: Start
scenes.onload: window.lastGpsWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('Waiting for G P S.',true);
scenes.onupdate: if (activity!=null && activity!='NOGPS') { daoplayer.speak('OK.',true); daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (totalTime-window.lastGpsWarning>10) { window.lastGpsWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('Waiting for G P S.', true); }

scenes.name: Start/any
scenes.onupdate: if (routes['J_CS-WR'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track1/MitaDelMundo'); } else if (routes['WR-PC_A'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track2A/SisterCities'); } else if (routes['PC_A-HR_L'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track2B/SisterCities'); } else if (routes['HR_L-HR_DA'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track3/NotAlone'); } else if (routes['HR_DA-DA_IG'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track4A/Stella'); } else if (routes['DA_IG-DA_HW'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track4B/Stella'); } else if (routes['DA_HW-DA_LTA'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track5/TheBadGuys'); } else if (routes['DA_LTA-LTA_LT'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track6/WaitingForGA'); } else if (routes['LTA_LT-LTA_WH'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArriveA1'); } else if (routes['LTA_WH-LTA_WHa'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArriveA2'); } else if (routes['LTA_WHa-LTA_WHb'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArriveA3'); } else if (routes['LTA_WHb-WH'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArriveA4'); } else if (waypoints['WH'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArriveB'); } else if (routes['WH_EP-J_CS'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('fixedPlaylistIn'); } else if (activity=='NOGPS') { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (totalTime-window.lastWarning>20) { window.lastWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('Music will continue when GPS reports you are near the route', false); }
